description: name of bus to which controllable vsc is attached
Nominal reactive power for limits in optimization.
Prime mover energy carrier (e.g. coal, gas, wind, solar); required for global constraints on primary energy in optimization.
Marginal cost of production of 1 MVar.
Fixed period costs of extending q_nom by 1 MVar, including periodized investment costs and periodic fixed O&M costs (e.g. annuitized investment costs).
Control strategy for VSC must be "PQ".
Whether to consider the component in basic functionality or not
